entity.Name: Account

Description.description: Business that represents a customer or potential customer. The company that is billed in business transactions.
Type an ID number or code for the account to quickly search and identify the account in system views.
Type the city for the primary address.
Type the country or region for the primary address.
Type the first line of the primary address.
Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.
Type the state or province of the primary address.
Type the city for the secondary address.
Type the country or region for the secondary address.
Type the first line of the secondary address.
Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the secondary address.
Type the state or province of the secondary address.
Type of the account.
Select the category that best describes the relationship between the account and your organization.
Type the primary email address for the account.
Party number for the Account
The description for the Telephone 1 value for the account. This column maps to the PrimaryContactPhoneDescription in the CustCustomerV3Entity in F&O.
Choose the primary contact for the account to provide quick access to contact details.

Description.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

entity.MobileOfflineFilters: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="account"> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="last-x-days" value="10"/> </filter> </entity> </fetch>
